person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Officials said the New Mexico Activities Association decided to bar Cito from any inter-scholastic competition until next October , regardless of the school he attends .

Let's think step by step.

1. Officials
2. New Mexico Activities Association
3. Cito (implied, as the person who was barred from inter-scholastic competition)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Officials said the New Mexico Activities Association decided to bar Cito from any inter-scholastic competition until next October , regardless of the school he attends .

Let's think step by step.

1. New Mexico
2. New Mexico Activities Association

Both New Mexico and New Mexico Activities Association are considered locations in this context. New Mexico is a geographical location, while New Mexico Activities Association is an organization that operates within the geographical location of New Mexico.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

1. New Mexico

New Mexico Activities Association is not a location, but rather an organization that operates within the location of New Mexico.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
